descriptionHtml:
adds a new room too the Dawnstar DB Sanctuary
also on steam workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=20400&searchtext=
look at the change log

i will try and fix this bug where every blacksmith only sells materials
New Armor will be added as soon as it is done

if you want to come with some suggestion then message me.

i am currently unable to do anyting about bugs, etc. becouse of my education, but if you are willing to help me fix this things, you may get the chance to do so

As i am currently unable to continue work of this mod i would ask you if you would like to continue work on this mod, taken that i still get credit for creating this mod of course, just throw a Pm my way, and i might give you access to change the mod, proven you give me a good reason to hand over the development to you
author: Amatarasu
